Author: SHossain#0007
Content: @vogelfreund you will find using BarterDEX very hard. Try swapping BEER/PIZZA first using HyperDEX and learn how it works. BarterDEX GUI is for advanced users and devs.

Author: Decker#3767
Content:
@SHossain i don't think that the BarterDEX GUI is for advanced users. We just need understandable description with examples of all functions and basics. Mean, before start BarterDEX every user should understand basic things:
1. what is utxo?
2. what is atomic swap and what the differencies between bdex and cex.
3. steps needed to swap complete.
4. small api description (users should know that alice and bob api exists, and should understand the difference between it)
without these basics - yes, users can find barterdex hard.

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: Thanks @Decker. @gcharang can you please make a doc detailing those points that @Decker mentioned?

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: That will be helpful. Thanks

Author: Decker#3767
